about_the_game:
Prepare for a spine-chilling adventure as you step into the shoes of a daring live streamer in Viral Fear! Gather your friends and embark on an unforgettable 1 to 4 player co-op journey into the heart of an abandoned forest, shrouded in mystery and dark legends. Together, you'll plunge into a live stream event like no other, where the boundaries between reality and horror blur into a nightmare realm.

Whispers of a cultist stronghold in the depths of the forest have surfaced, where chilling rituals are conducted to summon the malevolent Wendigo. Armed with your streaming gear and unwavering determination, stealth becomes your greatest ally as you navigate the eerie woods. Stay vigilant, for the cultists and the Wendigo's presence loom ever closer.

Viral Fear delivers a truly immersive co-op experience, where collaboration and strategic planning are paramount to your survival. Coordinate your movements and execute precise maneuvers through in-game voice chat to outwit the cultists and disrupt their unholy rituals.

Your objective is clear: seek out and destroy the ritual skulls and shrines scattered throughout the forest to weaken the Wendigo's hold on reality. But beware, the cultists will stop at nothing to protect their malevolent deity.

As you venture deeper into the heart of darkness, the tension escalates, and the forest itself seems to come alive with malicious intent. Keep your nerves steady as you confront your deepest fears and unravel the chilling secrets of the cult. Will you and your friends possess the courage necessary to face the Wendigo head-on and banish its nightmarish presence from the forest forever?

Key Features:

  • Thrilling 1 to 4 player co-op gameplay: Team up with friends and strategize your approach to dismantle the cult and confront the terrifying Wendigo.
  • Immersive stealth mechanics: Stay hidden, move silently, and exploit the environment as you navigate the treacherous forest.
  • Twitch chat connectivity! Allow your viewers to interact with your game to draw threats to your area.
  • Atmospheric setting: Explore a hauntingly atmospheric environment, teeming with chilling sights, sounds, and supernatural phenomena.
  • Dynamic AI enemies: Confront cunning cultists and face the bone-chilling Wendigo, each possessing unique behaviors and abilities.

Dare you enter the abyss, where legends and nightmares collide? Brace yourself for the live stream event of a lifetime in Viral Fear. Your courage and teamwork will determine the fate of the forest and its unholy secrets. Can you survive the night and emerge victorious against the encroaching viral fear?
